title: Workshop for Improving Mathematics Learning Design Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: University-level foundational mathematics knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Customized math learning design environment using real-time video conferencing systems and learner data analytics tools

learning_goals: Learning analytics tools can identify learners' mathematical comprehension patterns with 80% accuracy
Learners can design three or more data-driven problem-solving strategies for mathematics
Instructors can adjust teaching strategies by analyzing learner engagement data in real-time online classes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
